channel.title: Engages on LPS Qubit Collaboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Engages on LPS Qubit Collaboratory

item.title: ARO/LQC Broad Agency Announcement
item.description: The LQC BAA offers a means to establish collaborative agreements with LPS to conduct original research together. The ARO/LPS LQC BAA will be announced soon. Also see How the LQC Works and the FAQ.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Please send your questions to: usarmy.rtp.rdecom-aro.mesg.qcbox@mail.mil
